Name: NodeAgentInformation
RemarksComment: The Batch node agent is a program that runs on each node in the pool and provides Batch capability on the compute node.

Key.Name: Version
Key.SummaryComment: The version of the Batch node agent running on the compute node.
Key.RemarksComment: This version number can be checked against the node agent release notes located at https://github.com/Azure/Batch/blob/master/changelogs/nodeagent/CHANGELOG.md.

Key.Name: LastUpdateTime
Key.SummaryComment: The time when the node agent was updated on the compute node.
Key.RemarksComment: This is the most recent time that the node agent was updated to a new version.
